events.message: I would like to request a refund for the headphones I purchased last week because they do not work as expected.
The system has categorized the issue as a refund request based on the customer's mention of refund and product dissatisfaction.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the malfunctioning headphones.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the trouble with your headphones. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and details about the issue you are experiencing with the product?
The order number is 123456789. The headphones produce no sound at all, and I tried multiple devices.
Thank you for the information. We can process a full refund for your order once the headphones are returned. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund offer and look forward to receiving the return label.
The refund process has been initiated and the return label sent to your email. Please ship back the item to complete the refund.
Checking in to confirm you have successfully returned the headphones and if you have received your refund.
I returned the headphones yesterday and the refund has already appeared in my bank account. Thank you for the assistance.
We are glad your refund was processed successfully. Closing the case now. Please contact us if you need any help in the future.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. We would appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
